definitions.definition: To move something from one place to another, especially to take away.
definitions.example: He removed the marbles from the bag.

definitions.definition: To discard, set aside, especially something abstract (a thought, feeling, etc.).
To change one's residence; to move.
To dismiss or discharge from office.
Separated in time, space, or degree.
definitions.example: Now that we are here one week removed...

definitions.definition: Of a different generation, older or younger
definitions.example: Steve is my second cousin once removed.
